query.statement:
SELECT A.TM_CD, A.TM_NM, V.UPJANG, A.UPJANGNM, V.CLOSE_DATE, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('001', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '001', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) A, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('006', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '006', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) B, -- (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('003', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '003', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) C, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('004', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '004', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) D, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('005', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '005', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) E, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('008', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '008', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) F, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('009', '007') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '009', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) G, (CASE WHEN #CLOSE_GUBUN# IN ('012', '012') THEN MAX(DECODE(V.CLOSE_GUBUN, '012', CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, '')) ELSE '' END) H /* 전체마감에는 포함시키지 않기위해 CLOSE_GUBUN 007은 제외 */ FROM ( SELECT C.UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, D.CODE CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE UPJANG = C.UPJANG AND CLOSE_GUBUN = D.CODE AND CLOSE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD), 0, 'N', 'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B, (SELECT TM_NM, TM_CD, UPJANG, UPJANGNM, CLOSE_DATE FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE FICS_YN = 'N' AND FS_UPJANG = 'Y' ) C, (SELECT CODE FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'MA0035') D WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD AND D.CODE NOT IN (001,002,006, 008, 009)
UNION ALL
SELECT UPJANG, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE(CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE2||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE3, 'NNNN','N','Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE FROM ( SELECT #UPJANG# UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, '001' CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '11'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_MEAL_TICKET_SAL_MST WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND SALE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '11'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_ADVANCE_OCCUR WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '11'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE2, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND CLOSE_GUBUN = '001' AND CLOSE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD), 0, 'N', 'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE3 FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD )
UNION ALL
SELECT UPJANG, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE(CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1, 'NN','N','Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE FROM ( SELECT #UPJANG# UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, '006' CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '16'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND CLOSE_GUBUN = '006' AND CLOSE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD), 0, 'N', 'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1 FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD )
UNION ALL
SELECT UPJANG, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE(CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1, 'NN','N','Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE FROM ( SELECT #UPJANG# UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, '008' CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '19'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND CLOSE_GUBUN = '008' AND CLOSE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD), 0, 'N', 'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1 FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD )
UNION ALL
SELECT UPJANG, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE(CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1, 'NN','N','Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE FROM ( SELECT #UPJANG# UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, '009' CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '17'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND CLOSE_GUBUN = '009' AND CLOSE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD), 0, 'N', 'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1 FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD )
UNION ALL
SELECT UPJANG, CLOSE_DATE, CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE(CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE2||CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE3, 'NNNN','N','Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE FROM ( SELECT #UPJANG# UPJANG, MM||DD CLOSE_DATE, '012' CLOSE_GUBUN, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_UPJANG_SALS_DETAIL WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '12'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_MEAL_TICKET_SAL_MST WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND SALE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '12'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE1, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLA_IF_ADVANCE_OCCUR WHERE UPJANG_CD = #UPJANG# AND OCCUR_DATE = A.MM||B.DD AND DDDD_CLOSE_YN = 'Y' AND SYS_CLASS = '12'), 0, 'N' ,'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE2, DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CLOSE_MGMT WHERE UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND CLOSE_GUBUN = '012' AND CLOSE_DATE = A.MM||B.DD), 0, 'N', 'Y') CLOSE_GUBUNVALUE3 FROM (SELECT #CLOSE_DATE# MM FROM DUAL) A, (SELECT LPAD(ROWNUM,2,'0') DD FROM DICT WHERE ROWNUM <= 31) B WHERE TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(A.MM||'01','YYYYMMDD')),'DD') >= B.DD ) ) V, SCO_UPJANG_MST_V A WHERE (V.UPJANG = A.UPJANG) AND (A.CLOSE_DATE IS NULL)
AND (A.TM_CD = #TM_CD#)
AND (A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#)
GROUP BY A.TM_NM, A.TM_CD, V.UPJANG, A.UPJANGNM, V.CLOSE_DATE ORDER BY CLOSE_DATE
